pages.text: Witcher mutations grant them greater reflexes and agility over a regular human. They can utilise these skills by pressing $(6)$(l)[$(k:origins.primary_active)]$() $(l)(Origins: Primary Active)$() while moving in a direction to dodge. The Witcher can dodge in 8 different directions on a short cooldown.

pages.title: Cooldown Bar
pages.text: $(l)TIP$(): Witcher Reflexes are best used for mobility and dodging projectiles!
